Name: Knockout League - Arcade VR Boxing
About the game: Welcome to Knockout League, a single player arcade-style boxing game built from the ground up for virtual reality. Dodge flaming uppercuts, block sweeping tentacle attacks, and pummel your opponents using 1:1 tracking of your head and hands. Work up a serious sweat with various boxing drills like the focus mitts or the one and only Reflex Alley. Take on a crazy cast of characters, including a mad scientist and a wily octopus, each with different fighting styles and unique gameplay. Fight through them all to become the champion of the Knockout League!
